product_name: Nalgene Water Bottle Sleeve - 32 fl. oz.
long_description: The Nalgene Water Bottle sleeve keeps your 32 fl. oz. Nalgene water bottle insulated from heat or cold (water bottle sold separately). Neoprene keeps hot beverages hot and cold beverages cold, and it helps keep your water from freezing in cold temperatures. Includes a small accessory loop and a a stretchy drawcord to secure the sleeve.
short_description: The Nalgene Water Bottle sleeve keeps your 32 fl. oz. Nalgene water bottle insulated from heat or cold (water bottle sold separately).
